text: "Today, Tomorrow and Forever" is a 1957 song by country singer Patsy Cline and is the follow-up to her single Walkin' After Midnight. However this single was not so successful. ==Track listing== 7" vinyl single * "Today, Tomorrow and Forever" – 2:33 * "Try Again" – 2:00 == References == Category:1957 songs Category:Country songs Category:Patsy Cline songs
title: Today, Tomorrow and Forever (Patsy Cline song)
